column4: Hey guys, has anyone used a good remote assistance setup for linux before?
I setup my 11 year old little brother with Ibex, compiz has messed up on him, he was fiddling with compizconfig so he set something, but i wanted to setup a remote assistance thingy
i am looking at gitso, on google code, but it's not working for me at present.
well, just use one of the vnc apps? there are a lot of them in the repos
